Flow.description: Perubahan Rumus Laba Kotor : Pendapatan - HPP Laba Operational : Laba Kotor - Beban Operational Laba Rugi Sebelum Pajak : Laba Operational + Pendapatan Lain - Beban Lain-lain

formulas.name: fnc_ErrorMsg
formulas.expression: IF({!asalpage} = 'Survey' && {!Get_Survey.Opportunity__r.Loan_Status__c} = 'Credit Review', 'Tidak bisa menambah data Financial Statement, karena status survey sudah complete. Mohon lakukan proses selanjutnya [komite survey] dan [credit review].' , 'Tidak bisa menambah data Financial Statement, karena status diluar Credit Review')

Flow.label: [Scr] New Input Survey (Financial Statement)

validationRule.errorMessage: Input four digit number for Period Year.
